name: ezbookkeeping
description: ezBookkeeping is a self-hosted bookkeeping and finance management app. It tracks income, expenses, categories, accounts, and budgets, with charts and reports to help individuals or small businesses manage money.

features.title: Income & Expense Tracking
features.description: Monitor all financial transactions. Complete money management

features.title: Budget Management
features.description: Set and track spending limits. Stay within budget

features.title: Financial Reports
features.description: Charts and summaries of your money. Clear financial insights

features.title: Small Business Ready
features.description: Perfect for individuals and small businesses. Scalable solution

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your financial data private. Your books, your control
